greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, gcd(d,n/d) is a prime power} gcd(d,n/d).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: (PARI) A322020(n) = { my(m=1,p); fordiv(n, d, p = gcd(d, n/d); if(isprimepower(p), m *= p)); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 28 2018
